thread.title: Daler Mehendi entertains on Amitabh Bachchan’s show | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Daler Mehendi entertains on Amitabh Bachchan’s show | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Daler Mehendi entertains on Amitabh Bachchan’s show | Deccan Chronicle
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 20, 2015, 23.29 pm During the show, Big B revealed that almost 90 per cent of Daler’s earnings from his shows all over the world are given to charity. Recently, Daler Mehendi came as a guest on Amitabh Bachchan’s show Aaj Ki Raat Hai Zindagi. He was accompanied by his wife and daughter on the set. The occasion brought the duo back together on the same platform after 18 years. In 1997, Big B had lip-synced to the chartbuster track Na Na Na Na Na Re sung by Daler Mehendi in the film Mrityudaata. Daler said on the show, “I am really glad that it is for a show like this. I think it’s great that this show is high on entertainment and yet it addresses these inspiring, untold, positive stories. And of course, sharing the stage with him is always an honour.”
During the show, Big B revealed that almost 90 per cent of Daler’s earnings from his shows all over the world are given to charity. Not only that, Daler has also taken up the initiative of a tree plantation drive and has planted more than 6 lakh trees till now.
